thread.title: Nervous investors turn tail again, sending Dow down 470 points

author: Kathleen Pender
title: Nervous investors turn tail again, sending Dow down 470 points
text:
Photo: Andrew Burton / Andrew Burton / Getty Images 8564963|article-6478533|7 8564963|article-6478533|1 email_share_embed|photo-8564963|article-6478533|1 8564963|article-6478533|2 8564963|article-6478533|3 8564963|article-6478533|4 8564963|article-6478533|5 google_share_embed|photo-8564963|article-6478533|6 A trader works on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange August 31 in New York City. After volatile mid-morning trading Tuesday, the Dow Jones Industrial Average was down more than 400 points. A trader works on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange August...
Investors got another case of the jitters Tuesday, sending U.S. stocks back into correction territory. A trader works on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange August 31 in New York City. After volatile mid-morning trading Tuesday, the Dow Jones Industrial Average was down more than 400 points. A trader works on the floor of the New York Stock Exchange August...
Investors got another case of the jitters Tuesday, sending U.S. stocks back into correction territory.
